A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not sure where to start. This was just a horrible movie in general. Full of plot hole and really just destroyed the franchise. If I had known I would not have seen it. But I was trying to avoid spoilers. Wouldn't have mattered because there was no possible way you could spoil this bad of a movie. Star Wars has no where left to go. I'm completely done with the franchise and will not see another Disney Star Wars ever again.
